channel.title: TikTok Shop Dev Updates
channel.description: Official updates for TikTok Shop developer docs

item.title: About the Partner Center Console
item.description: Welcome to the TikTok Shop Partner Center Console end user documentation! The [Partner Center Console](https://partner-sso.tiktok.com/account/login) is the web application used by TikTok Shop Partners of all types to create and manage the services they offer to sellers and creators, and streamline daily operations. The TikTok Shop Partner Center Console simplifies collaboration processes and offers valuable insights into your business. If you're just getting started and haven't yet determined wh...
item.content:encoded: Welcome to the TikTok Shop Partner Center Console end user documentation! The [Partner Center Console](https://partner-sso.tiktok.com/account/login) is the web application used by TikTok Shop Partners of all types to create and manage the services they offer to sellers and creators, and streamline daily operations. The TikTok Shop Partner Center Console simplifies collaboration processes and offers valuable insights into your business. If you're just getting started and haven't yet determined wh...

item.title: Developer
item.description: # What is a Developer? Using the TikTok Shop APIs, developers build applications that offer sellers solutions to automate, manage and grow their businesses on TikTok Shop. Via the TikTok Shop Partner Center, we provide a comprehensive set of technical tools, resources, and APIs that allow developers to integrate directly with TikTok Shop. Our APIs span the entirety of the seller operation process, allowing developers to create integrations that can streamline merchant workflows and improve custo...
item.content:encoded: # What is a Developer? Using the TikTok Shop APIs, developers build applications that offer sellers solutions to automate, manage and grow their businesses on TikTok Shop. Via the TikTok Shop Partner Center, we provide a comprehensive set of technical tools, resources, and APIs that allow developers to integrate directly with TikTok Shop. Our APIs span the entirety of the seller operation process, allowing developers to create integrations that can streamline merchant workflows and improve custo...

item.title: TikTok Shop Partner (TSP)
item.description: # What is TikTok Shop Partner (TSP) ？ TikTok Shop Partners (TSPs) offer a range of services to sellers, including operational mentoring, content creation, and shop management, enabling sellers to scale their businesses on TikTok Shop effectively. Click to learn more about [TSP service categories](64f1989064ed2e0295f3c1b5#TSP) # What are the benefits of becoming a TSP on TikTok Shop？ **New Leads** * Have the opportunity to be recommended to suitable sellers and brands **Service Market Discovery**...
item.content:encoded: # What is TikTok Shop Partner (TSP) ？ TikTok Shop Partners (TSPs) offer a range of services to sellers, including operational mentoring, content creation, and shop management, enabling sellers to scale their businesses on TikTok Shop effectively. Click to learn more about [TSP service categories](64f1989064ed2e0295f3c1b5#TSP) # What are the benefits of becoming a TSP on TikTok Shop？ **New Leads** * Have the opportunity to be recommended to suitable sellers and brands **Service Market Discovery**...

item.title: Creator Agency Partner (CAP)
item.description: # What is Creator Agency Partner (CAP)? Creator Agency Partner (CAP) incubates and supports creators within the TikTok Shop ecosystem. These agencies either manage, represent, or have access to creator talents in the US and serve TikTok Shop by acquiring, educating, and incubating creators to produce Short Video + LIVE e-co content at scale. # What are the benefits of becoming a CAP on TikTok Shop？ **Collaboration Opportunities** * CAP can gain access to exciting collaboration opportunities with...
item.content:encoded: # What is Creator Agency Partner (CAP)? Creator Agency Partner (CAP) incubates and supports creators within the TikTok Shop ecosystem. These agencies either manage, represent, or have access to creator talents in the US and serve TikTok Shop by acquiring, educating, and incubating creators to produce Short Video + LIVE e-co content at scale. # What are the benefits of becoming a CAP on TikTok Shop？ **Collaboration Opportunities** * CAP can gain access to exciting collaboration opportunities with...

item.title: Non-US TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP)
item.description: The Affiliate Partner program is currently available in **Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam, United Kingdom** ## What is a TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner？ Affiliate partners offer matchmaking services for both sellers and creators and assist sellers in distributing and promoting products through dedicated product campaigns. 📌 Check to add a new service category [here](64f19887dc7f3e028d381064). Please choose" **Seller and Scalable Creator Match-up"** as your service category ## ...
item.content:encoded: The Affiliate Partner program is currently available in **Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam, United Kingdom** ## What is a TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner？ Affiliate partners offer matchmaking services for both sellers and creators and assist sellers in distributing and promoting products through dedicated product campaigns. 📌 Check to add a new service category [here](64f19887dc7f3e028d381064). Please choose" **Seller and Scalable Creator Match-up"** as your service category ## ...

item.title: US TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP)
item.description: # Overview This guide covers how agencies can use Partner Campaigns to create campaigns between Sellers and Creators. With this tool, Sellers can register and submit products to an agency's campaign, and determine the commission they would like to offer to the agency. Then the agency chooses the commission they would like to set for the managed or unmanaged Creators they've selected for the campaign. Agencies share product links with the Creators so they can add the products to their showcases a...
item.content:encoded: # Overview This guide covers how agencies can use Partner Campaigns to create campaigns between Sellers and Creators. With this tool, Sellers can register and submit products to an agency's campaign, and determine the commission they would like to offer to the agency. Then the agency chooses the commission they would like to set for the managed or unmanaged Creators they've selected for the campaign. Agencies share product links with the Creators so they can add the products to their showcases a...

item.title: Multi-Channel Network (MCN)
item.description: # What is Multi-Channel Network (MCN)? Multi-Channel Network (MCN) incubate and support creators within the TikTok Shop ecosystem. This type of partner supports creators in various aspects, including shoppable video content creation, shoppable livestream operations, and creator-product matchmaking for affiliate programs. # What are the benefits of becoming a MCN on TikTok Shop？ **Collaboration Opportunities** * MCN members gain access to exciting collaboration opportunities with renowned sellers...
item.content:encoded: # What is Multi-Channel Network (MCN)? Multi-Channel Network (MCN) incubate and support creators within the TikTok Shop ecosystem. This type of partner supports creators in various aspects, including shoppable video content creation, shoppable livestream operations, and creator-product matchmaking for affiliate programs. # What are the benefits of becoming a MCN on TikTok Shop？ **Collaboration Opportunities** * MCN members gain access to exciting collaboration opportunities with renowned sellers...

item.title: [US] Service Category- Shop Registration
item.description: # **Introduction** The Shop Registration service category empowers TSPs to streamline the process of referring sellers to TikTok Shop through automated referral link generation and link management. The service category is open to both Local-to-Local (operating locally in the U.S.) and Cross-Border (operating outside the U.S.) partners. # **Step by Step guide** ## U.S. Entity Partners ### **For new partners** New partners can directly follow the instructions in the **U.S. Agency Partner Onboard G...
item.content:encoded: # **Introduction** The Shop Registration service category empowers TSPs to streamline the process of referring sellers to TikTok Shop through automated referral link generation and link management. The service category is open to both Local-to-Local (operating locally in the U.S.) and Cross-Border (operating outside the U.S.) partners. # **Step by Step guide** ## U.S. Entity Partners ### **For new partners** New partners can directly follow the instructions in the **U.S. Agency Partner Onboard G...

item.title: Partner service categories
item.description: Service categories are predefined groupings that help organize and categorize the various services offered by partners on TikTok Shop Partner Center. These categories make it easier for TikTok Shop sellers to find relevant services that align with their needs and goals. Partners can select the appropriate service category when creating a service to ensure it's listed in the relevant section of the App & Service Store, making it more discoverable to potential clients. 📌 The service categories ava...
item.content:encoded: Service categories are predefined groupings that help organize and categorize the various services offered by partners on TikTok Shop Partner Center. These categories make it easier for TikTok Shop sellers to find relevant services that align with their needs and goals. Partners can select the appropriate service category when creating a service to ensure it's listed in the relevant section of the App & Service Store, making it more discoverable to potential clients. 📌 The service categories ava...

item.title: Partner registration application requirement
item.description: # MCN/ CAP IF you are MCN/CAP, Please choose "Creator management" as Business category ### **Common Qualification information** Common qualification information will keep same for different categories . You only need to fill in one time while onboard. If you want to apply for the new category, common qualification information will be automatically reused and you don't need to fill in again. | **Field** | **Format** | **Remarks** | | --- | --- | --- | | Full company name | Text | requires the nam...
item.content:encoded: # MCN/ CAP IF you are MCN/CAP, Please choose "Creator management" as Business category ### **Common Qualification information** Common qualification information will keep same for different categories . You only need to fill in one time while onboard. If you want to apply for the new category, common qualification information will be automatically reused and you don't need to fill in again. | **Field** | **Format** | **Remarks** | | --- | --- | --- | | Full company name | Text | requires the nam...

item.title: Edit certification details
item.description: ## 🔥 **Product Overview** ### **Why do we support partners editing the certification details？** Currently, the partner is required to provide certification details to join TTSPC. Once the platform has reviewed and approved certification details, these certification details cannot be changed. However, there may be instances where a partner needs to update their certification details, such as their name, logo, etc. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/64d2ad25a8...
item.content:encoded: ## 🔥 **Product Overview** ### **Why do we support partners editing the certification details？** Currently, the partner is required to provide certification details to join TTSPC. Once the platform has reviewed and approved certification details, these certification details cannot be changed. However, there may be instances where a partner needs to update their certification details, such as their name, logo, etc. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/64d2ad25a8...

item.title: [SEA] Creator Level for Partners
item.description: In this article, we’ll show teach you how to navigate and use the Creator Level system to support your future partnerships with Affiliate Creators. To get you started, we will go over the following: * What is Creator Level? * Why Do We Show Creator Level to Partners? * Where to find the Creator's Levels in the Partner Center **The tasks and benefits shown in the screenshots may not reflect the current version of Creator Level. Please check your Partner Center for the most up-to-date list.* # Wha...

To get you started, we will go over the following: * What is Creator Level? * Why Do We Show Creator Level to Partners? * Where to find the Creator's Levels in the Partner Center **The tasks and benefits shown in the screenshots may not reflect the current version of Creator Level. item.title: [US] TikTok Shop Partner Tiering Mechanism
item.description: The TikTok Shop Partners('TSP') tiering system is designed to cultivate a robust ecosystem, set service benchmarks, and offer customized resources for TSP at various development stages—thereby guiding their growth path. *This Tiering Mechanism only applies to TikTok Shop Partners certified and operating in the US market.* # **Rules for TSP Tiering** ## **2.1 TSP Tiers** **For regular type TSPs** TSPs will be divided into 6 tiers from V0 to V5, corresponding to the V0 TSP->V1 Certified TSP->V2 Br...
item.content:encoded: The TikTok Shop Partners('TSP') tiering system is designed to cultivate a robust ecosystem, set service benchmarks, and offer customized resources for TSP at various development stages—thereby guiding their growth path. *This Tiering Mechanism only applies to TikTok Shop Partners certified and operating in the US market.* # **Rules for TSP Tiering** ## **2.1 TSP Tiers** **For regular type TSPs** TSPs will be divided into 6 tiers from V0 to V5, corresponding to the V0 TSP->V1 Certified TSP->V2 Br...

item.title: Create and publish a service
item.description: # What is a TikTok Shop Service? A TikTok Shop Service is an offering created by a partner through TikTok Shop Partner Center. It serves as an introduction to the partner's capabilities and acts as an online service invitation extended to TikTok Shop sellers. These services can be made public, available for all sellers to see and authorize (Public Service), or they can be shared privately with specific sellers the partner has already connected with (Custom Service). There are two types of servic...
item.content:encoded: # What is a TikTok Shop Service? A TikTok Shop Service is an offering created by a partner through TikTok Shop Partner Center. It serves as an introduction to the partner's capabilities and acts as an online service invitation extended to TikTok Shop sellers. These services can be made public, available for all sellers to see and authorize (Public Service), or they can be shared privately with specific sellers the partner has already connected with (Custom Service). There are two types of servic...

item.title: Listing your service on the App & Service Store
item.description: 📌 The **App & Service Store** features services and apps tailored to help sellers in efficiently managing and growing their businesses. Thus, only services catering to sellers can be showcased on the App & Service Store. Note that only TSPs (TikTok Shop Partners) can list their services in the app store, given their role in supporting sellers. # Considerations before listing your service ## Service discoverability Discoverability of your service on the **App & Service Store** depends on three ke...
item.content:encoded: 📌 The **App & Service Store** features services and apps tailored to help sellers in efficiently managing and growing their businesses. Thus, only services catering to sellers can be showcased on the App & Service Store. Note that only TSPs (TikTok Shop Partners) can list their services in the app store, given their role in supporting sellers. # Considerations before listing your service ## Service discoverability Discoverability of your service on the **App & Service Store** depends on three ke...

item.title: Edit your app and service
item.description: ## **🔥 Optimization Overview** ## Why do we build this feature? For ISV and TSP, they are not able to change product information once the service has been published online. This brings inconvenience for TSP&ISV to build authorization with a new Seller. ## ⭐️ **Key updates** ### Support ISV & Cross border TSP to add new Seller Market If you want to add a new target seller to your public/custom service, you can go to service detail page and click edit seller type You can add a new seller type or d...
item.content:encoded: ## **🔥 Optimization Overview** ## Why do we build this feature? For ISV and TSP, they are not able to change product information once the service has been published online. This brings inconvenience for TSP&ISV to build authorization with a new Seller. ## ⭐️ **Key updates** ### Support ISV & Cross border TSP to add new Seller Market If you want to add a new target seller to your public/custom service, you can go to service detail page and click edit seller type You can add a new seller type or d...

item.title: Seller Leads Pool
item.description: # What is Seller Leads Pool? The Seller Leads Pool helps TSP receive qualified seller inquiries and choose which businesses to connect with based on detailed information. TSP can see key business details like company size, GMV, and category to help make informed decisions about potential partnerships. **Key Features & Benefits:** * Quality Leads: Service Partners can review seller business profiles and requirements before deciding to connect * Full Control: Service Partners can choose which inqu...
item.content:encoded: # What is Seller Leads Pool? The Seller Leads Pool helps TSP receive qualified seller inquiries and choose which businesses to connect with based on detailed information. TSP can see key business details like company size, GMV, and category to help make informed decisions about potential partnerships. **Key Features & Benefits:** * Quality Leads: Service Partners can review seller business profiles and requirements before deciding to connect * Full Control: Service Partners can choose which inqu...

item.title: Management- Manage authorizations
item.description: # Introduction The Shop Management page is where partners can view and manage all their authorizations with sellers. # Guide Once the seller has authorized Apps or Services, DTSP will be able to check and manage authorization on the *Seller Management - Manage* Authorize *page* Tips: Partners can use the filters below to locate specific authorizations. eg authorization ID, service name, shop name/code/id ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/07f8649b1dbb422a926...
item.content:encoded: # Introduction The Shop Management page is where partners can view and manage all their authorizations with sellers. # Guide Once the seller has authorized Apps or Services, DTSP will be able to check and manage authorization on the *Seller Management - Manage* Authorize *page* Tips: Partners can use the filters below to locate specific authorizations. eg authorization ID, service name, shop name/code/id ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/07f8649b1dbb422a926...

item.title: TSP Access Feature
item.description: ## **Background** TikTok Shop Partners (TSPs) are e-commerce service providers focused on Seller Service (Shop Management, LIVE Management, Short Video Management, Seller Affiliate Management). They often need to log into the seller center to assist merchants with their daily activities. However, there are a couple of significant challenges. For example, TSPs face the inconvenience of juggling multiple sub-accounts when performing operations on behalf of sellers. To streamline the way TSPs reque...
item.content:encoded: ## **Background** TikTok Shop Partners (TSPs) are e-commerce service providers focused on Seller Service (Shop Management, LIVE Management, Short Video Management, Seller Affiliate Management). They often need to log into the seller center to assist merchants with their daily activities. However, there are a couple of significant challenges. For example, TSPs face the inconvenience of juggling multiple sub-accounts when performing operations on behalf of sellers. To streamline the way TSPs reque...

item.title: TSP Access Seller-Creator IM
item.description: # **Steps to use Seller-Creator IM** TSP can utilize the features of Seller-Creator IM if authorized for Full Access or Affiliation. After logging into the Seller Center via TSP Access, on the “Affiliate” page, click the “Go to Affiliate Center Home” button to enter the Affiliate Center. Once in the Affiliate Center, TSPs can use Creator IM just like sellers do through 5 entrances. Please refer to the [Seller - Creator IM User Guide](https://seller-us.tiktok.com/university/essay?course_type=1&fr...
item.content:encoded: # **Steps to use Seller-Creator IM** TSP can utilize the features of Seller-Creator IM if authorized for Full Access or Affiliation. After logging into the Seller Center via TSP Access, on the “Affiliate” page, click the “Go to Affiliate Center Home” button to enter the Affiliate Center. Once in the Affiliate Center, TSPs can use Creator IM just like sellers do through 5 entrances. Please refer to the [Seller - Creator IM User Guide](https://seller-us.tiktok.com/university/essay?course_type=1&fr...

item.title: [MY] TSP Service Report
item.description: # **Overview** To better measure the actual contribution of TSP to merchants, the platform are now supporting TSP to upload service information to the platform. Your account manager will be able to check your service information and further performance checking. # **Feature introduction** ### Step 1 Click the "service report" after getting authorization After getting authorization from the seller, TSP can start to input their service report details with the seller. | **[Manage Authorization]** *...
item.content:encoded: # **Overview** To better measure the actual contribution of TSP to merchants, the platform are now supporting TSP to upload service information to the platform. Your account manager will be able to check your service information and further performance checking. # **Feature introduction** ### Step 1 Click the "service report" after getting authorization After getting authorization from the seller, TSP can start to input their service report details with the seller. | **[Manage Authorization]** *...

item.title: [US] TSP Service Details
item.description: # **Summary** To better measure the actual contribution of TSP to the Seller, the platform is now supporting TSP to upload Service Details. The platform will be able to check your information to verify your service. **Please note:** You can still work with the seller without service details. However, only authorizations with approved service details will be recognized as valid for GMV performance and will qualify for further platform incentives. # **Feature introduction** ## Step 1: Click the "S...
item.content:encoded: # **Summary** To better measure the actual contribution of TSP to the Seller, the platform is now supporting TSP to upload Service Details. The platform will be able to check your information to verify your service. **Please note:** You can still work with the seller without service details. However, only authorizations with approved service details will be recognized as valid for GMV performance and will qualify for further platform incentives. # **Feature introduction** ## Step 1: Click the "S...

item.title: [US TSP] TSP Service Offer
item.description: # What is the Service Offer？ TSP Service allows TSPs to bundle service lists and offer authorization details for sellers to review and authorize. TSP will have two options to get authorization from the seller. **Option 1: Default authorization application** TSPs can share the “Default authorization application” link with the seller. The seller will need to select authorization details **Option 2: Prefill service offer [NEW]** TSPs can offer authorization details by clicking "pre-fill service off...
item.content:encoded: # What is the Service Offer？ TSP Service allows TSPs to bundle service lists and offer authorization details for sellers to review and authorize. TSP will have two options to get authorization from the seller. **Option 1: Default authorization application** TSPs can share the “Default authorization application” link with the seller. The seller will need to select authorization details **Option 2: Prefill service offer [NEW]** TSPs can offer authorization details by clicking "pre-fill service off...

item.title: [US TSP] Manage Company Profile
item.description: Please note: This feature is currently in beta testing and is only available to selected TSPs by invitation. If you're interested in using it, please reach out to your account manager. # Introduction: What is the TSP Company Profile? To improve matchmaking efficiency between sellers and TSPs and help merchants to form a comprehensive understanding of TSPs, the TSP profile feature includes the following key functions: 1. Allows TSPs to manage their company profile information on the TikTok Shop P...

item.content:encoded: ### Update Table | **Date** | **Updates** | | --- | --- | | 2024.6.13 | **Simplified and streamlined Seller Center Access:** TSPs can effortlessly share a request for Seller Center access with sellers and obtain authorization. **** After authorization, TSPs can access Seller Center directly from the Partner Center ++with just one click.++ TSPs are allowed to access up to **six months** of historical data now. | | 2024.05 | Launched **Shop Analytics** to provide shop overall metrics and GMV attri...

item.title: Steps to cancel authorization for TSP
item.description: # Introduction This tool allows TSPs to request the cancellation of service authorization. If the seller agrees to the cancellation or fails to respond within 72 hours, the authorization will be automatically terminated. # Step 1: TSP raises a cancellation request TSP can navigate to ++TikTok Shop Partner Center-> Seller Management++ and click terminate++ ++to raise a cancel authorization request. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/6ef558997b7f4b6d95f1e7e55d...
item.content:encoded: # Introduction This tool allows TSPs to request the cancellation of service authorization. If the seller agrees to the cancellation or fails to respond within 72 hours, the authorization will be automatically terminated. # Step 1: TSP raises a cancellation request TSP can navigate to ++TikTok Shop Partner Center-> Seller Management++ and click terminate++ ++to raise a cancel authorization request. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/6ef558997b7f4b6d95f1e7e55d...

item.title: [US] TSP Online Signing Process
item.description: # Introduction: What is TSP Online Signing? TSP Online Signing is a feature that allows TSPs to establish online signing relationships with sellers. # What are the benefits？ * **Smoother Workflow:** TSPs can initiate a service proposal, which the seller can then review and confirm. * **Official Signing:** By detailing service specifics and related information, TSPs can establish official signing relationships with sellers, ensuring clear communication and agreed-upon terms. # What's the workflow...
item.content:encoded: # Introduction: What is TSP Online Signing? TSP Online Signing is a feature that allows TSPs to establish online signing relationships with sellers. # What are the benefits？ * **Smoother Workflow:** TSPs can initiate a service proposal, which the seller can then review and confirm. * **Official Signing:** By detailing service specifics and related information, TSPs can establish official signing relationships with sellers, ensuring clear communication and agreed-upon terms. # What's the workflow...

item.title: [US]Expand to All 3 Partner Services to Unlock Tier Growth & Benefits
item.description: Dear Partner, We encourage you to expand and activate all three partner service categories in Partner Center: **Creator Matchmaking, Seller Service,** and **Creator Service.** Doing so allows you to unlock more collaboration opportunities and can help you grow your business more effectively. By offering more comprehensive services, you not only provide end-to-end support to sellers and creators but also improve the chances of reaching a higher TSP Tier. Partners offering a single service have th...
item.content:encoded: Dear Partner, We encourage you to expand and activate all three partner service categories in Partner Center: **Creator Matchmaking, Seller Service,** and **Creator Service.** Doing so allows you to unlock more collaboration opportunities and can help you grow your business more effectively. item.title: Creator Management - Find Creators (US)
item.description: ## **What is Find Creators？** Find creators helps CAPs discover and partner with TikTok’s Creator community. ## **How It Works？** * Find creators is a set of features that enable CAPs to connect and collaborate with Creators. * CAPs can view the contact information of the creator or send an invitation with one click. * CAPs can search for creators by using filters such as Creators, Followers, and Performance. ## **What type of creator can be found on Find Creators？** Creators who have e-commerce...
item.content:encoded: ## **What is Find Creators？** Find creators helps CAPs discover and partner with TikTok’s Creator community. ## **How It Works？** * Find creators is a set of features that enable CAPs to connect and collaborate with Creators. * CAPs can view the contact information of the creator or send an invitation with one click. * CAPs can search for creators by using filters such as Creators, Followers, and Performance. ## **What type of creator can be found on Find Creators？** Creators who have e-commerce...

item.title: Creator Management - Linking with Creators for Data Authorization & Commission Sharing (US ONLY)
item.description: # Overview We are making collecting management fees from creators a more seamless experience by including commission sharing as part of our onboarding process in the TikTok Shop Partner Center. You can now link accounts, authorize data sharing, and set up commission sharing in a single request. It's now even easier to start working with your creators and earn revenue sooner. When setting up a creator relationship, you'll establish the fee agreement rate you're taking from the creator's TikTok Sh...
item.content:encoded: # Overview We are making collecting management fees from creators a more seamless experience by including commission sharing as part of our onboarding process in the TikTok Shop Partner Center. item.title: CAP Agency LIVE Commission (US)
item.description: # Overview This introduction provides an overview of new product features enabling CAP Agencies to establish exclusive LIVE commission-sharing agreements. The new fee agreement for LIVE empowers CAP Agencies to collaborate with their bound Creators, driving LIVE business growth while ensuring a dedicated revenue stream for providing LIVE-focused services. # How to set up LIVE commission sharing? ### Set up LIVE commission with new Creators #### Step I: CAP Agencies set up a fee agreement * Login...
